## Bio
<!-- <p>I’m an <strong>IT Quant</strong> at <a href="https://www.cfm.com/">Capital Fund Management</a> in Paris, working on options data with the data volatility team.</p>

I’m an IT Quant at [Capital Fund Management](https://www.cfm.com/) in Paris, working on options data with the data volatility team. 
I graduated with a Master’s in Financial Engineering from ENSIMAG in Grenoble, specializing in quantitative finance, stochastic calculus, and derivatives.

Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new technologies and problem-solving. I’m also passionate about sharing knowledge and contributing to the finance and tech communities.

**Interests:** Algorithmic trading, Quantitative Finance, Algorithm Development, Financial Technology, Continuous Learning 


## Inquiries
If you have questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, feel free to [contact me](mailto:tariq.sereir77@gmail.com). I am always interested in discussing workshop offerings and collaborative opportunities.
